title: pAl Urum vAyAlE
sahitya:
pAl Urum vAyAlE pADip-paNi sheyyum paravasha varam taruvAi paramporuLE


anupallavi

  nAlArum IreTTum vAlAyamAi arindE nAvukkarasu pOlum nammAzhvAr pOlumE


caraNam    anbu nirambiya amuda nalvAkkil un azhaguk-kalai poliya aruLuNar OngiDa
inbak-kanavinilE iruvarum oruvarAi iNainda sukham tanil ezhunda kavitaiyAm
